A virtual reality experience that lets users explore the history of their family's cookie jar. Users can put on a VR headset and be transported back in time to see their ancestors baking cookies in their own kitchen. The experience could include interactive elements, such as being able to taste the cookies or even help with the baking process.

A smart cookie jar that can detect when cookies are running low and automatically orders more from an online bakery. The jar could also track cookie consumption and provide insights on the most popular flavors and types of cookies eaten in the household.

A cookie-themed escape room where players have to solve puzzles and clues related to cookies to escape a "cookie jar prison." The room could be decorated with cookie-themed decorations and the puzzles could include things like decoding cookie recipes or identifying different types of cookies.

A cookie-making robot that can create custom cookies based on a user's preferences. The robot could use a combination of AI and 3D printing to create intricate designs and flavors. Users could upload their own designs or choose from pre-made templates.

A cookie-themed board game where players take on the role of cookie bakers and have to collect ingredients, bake cookies, and sell them to customers. The game could include different levels of difficulty and special power-ups, such as a "cookie jar" that gives players extra cookies or a "baking disaster" that sets players back.
